metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010266 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: lodash prior to 4.17.11 is affected by: CWE-400: Uncontrolled ResourceConsumption. The impact is: Denial of service. The component is: Datehandler. The attack vector is: Attacker provides very long strings, whichthe library attempts to match using a regular expression. The fixed versionis: 4.17.11.

criterions.comment: node-lodash package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
